elements.name: descriptionText
elements.html:
Thank you for your interest in joining the Our Health Project!

Complete the form below to tell us about yourself. Our goal is to learn more about genetic and other risk factors that increase the risk of cardiovascular diseases among South Asian populations. With this effort we plan to collect health information from you and your medical records as well as collect, process, and store a sample of your saliva for research purposes.

We will record your answers but will only keep detailed contact information if you qualify for the study and want to participate. We will not keep or store your contact information if you do not qualify for the study.

elements.name: ourhealth_prereg_ancestry
elements.title: Are you of South Asian ancestry?

validators.text: You must be of South Asian ancestry to join our study
You must be 18 or older to participate

elements.name: ourhealth_prereg_liveInUs
elements.title: Do you live in the United States?

validators.text: You must live in the United States to join our study
